conbody.p: Azure IoT Hub Producer destinationoverviewdestinationsAzure IoT Hub ProducerThe Azure IoT Hub Producer destination writes data to Microsoft Azure IoT Hub. To write to Microsoft Azure Data Lake Store, use the Azure Data Lake Store destination. To write to Microsoft Azure Event Hub, use the Azure Event Hub Producer destination.
Use the Azure IoT Hub Producer destination in a pipeline when you want to send device data - such as temperature or sensor data - to Azure IoT Hub after processing the data.
functions as a simulated device that sends messages to Azure IoT Hub. Before you configure the Azure IoT Hub Producer destination, register as a simulated device in your IoT hub.

When you configure the Azure IoT Hub Producer destination, you specify connection information such as the IoT hub name and device ID. You also specify the authentication key that the destination uses to identify itself when it sends messages to your IoT hub.
